channel.title: Ghostred Ctf on noxale

item.title: [GhostRed CTF - Owasp Israel 2017] Old School Cool WIP!!!!
item.description: At first we need to check if the executable was packed with a packer of some sort. I’ll use “DetectItEasy” for this check: Nice, the executable isn’t packed! It’s now time for RE, let’s use IDA Pro. (I use the newest version - 7.0) When I try to RE something I always open the “Strings window” first, to find some helpful messages which can have xrefs for important functions.
